data.text: @NewsNancy9 Yes we do & everyone will be affected in one way or another if they haven’t already 💯 It is incredibly sad what they have done & we are being told we “shouldn’t” have a voice 🤷🏻‍♀️ NoNo I say different & I know millions more share this as well 💯
@hamsdaughter @NewsNancy9 @JVER2ME That would be awesome if it could be reversed ❤️🙏❤️
@NewsNancy9 @V_its_me888 Because they took the liability away from the drug makers so they don't really care
@NewsNancy9 @JVER2ME I’ve heard that good people are working on antidotes.
